title: Desperate Measures (1R245)
text: Set: The Fellowship of the Ring Kind: Shadow Culture: Sauron Twilight: 2 Card Type: Event Game Text: Maneuver: Spot a [Sauron] Orc and remove a burden to make the Free Peoples player discard top 5 cards from his draw deck. Lore: ”'Go back, Sam. You can't swim. I'm going to Mordor alone.'” Rarity: R Notes: Should read “discard the top 5 cards…“
